Key Match Events: Zimbabwe beat India by 13 runs in Harare
India's Shubman Gill walks back to the pavilion after his dismissal
India lost five wickets halfway through the match
India's No.10 batter was out while chasing 115
India restricted Zimbabwe to 115 for nine
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill said he should have carried the bat through the first T20I against Zimbabwe
Gill termed his side's batting effort as disappointing
Gill expressed disappointment with the way he got out and the rest of the match panned out
Gill mentioned that the team could not execute its plans
Gill said India were a bit under-par on the field despite bowling well
Miscellaneous Highlights: India were recently crowned champions in the T20 World Cup albeit with a different set of players
